short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutes the Netflix sound at the beginning of each episode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you hate every time the big ta-dum/ba-boom sound shows up when you're trying to Netflix and relax? Well, same, so I made this extension that mutes it. You can turn the feature off from the popup in the extension bar too, in case you start to miss it (but why?).
